Name: Black Cycle
About the game: Consumers have power. A 10-minute walking simulator game about how we normally consume. Working as a member of a manufacturing company, and you will understand again the simple cycle in which things are made and consumed. Follow your boss's instructions to create things that meet consumer demand while having a conversation with people in the world. Through an alternative world that is simple, exaggerated and yet somehow reminiscent of everyday life, I hope Black Cycle will make you think a little about the social impact of this sequence of behaviors.
